Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • model.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.util.Observable
    Player Class represents a player
    Since:
    1.0

      • Player

        public Player(java.lang.String playerName,
              int armies,
              java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> countries,
              java.util.ArrayList<Card> cards,
              int infantryCount,
              int cavalryCount,
              int cannonCount)
        Creates a player with the specified player's name and armies
        Parameters:
        playerName - A String representing the name of the player
        armies - An integer representing the number of armies of player
        countries - An ArrayList representing the list of countries that the player owns
        cards - A list of cards a player owns
        infantryCount - Number of infantry cards of player
        cavalryCount - Number of cavalry cards of player
        cannonCount - Number of cannon cards of player
